exercises.name: Chord Perfect Practice D Chord
exercises.description: Strum, pick strings individually, strum again. Adjust fingers if any string is muffled.

exercises.name: Chord Perfect Practice A Chord
exercises.description: Keep fingers bunched together. Ensure the high E string rings clearly.

exercises.name: Anchor Finger A & D Chords
exercises.description: Keep the index finger (1st finger) on the 3rd string while switching between A and D.

exercises.name: One Minute Changes A to D
exercises.description: Switch between A and D as many times as possible. Quality counts, but push for speed.

exercises.name: One Minute Changes D to A
exercises.description: Switching back. Focus on the 'pivot' movement of the index finger.

exercises.name: Chord Perfect Practice E Chord
exercises.description: Same shape as Am but moved up one string. Ensure the 1st finger is pressing firmly.

exercises.name: Chord Perfect Practice D Chord
exercises.description: Quick refresher. Keep that 'D' shape tight and clear.

exercises.name: Chord Perfect Practice A Chord
exercises.description: Quick refresher. Try to get all three fingers to land at the same time.

exercises.name: Anchor Finger E, A & D Chords
exercises.description: Use the 1st finger as the anchor point for all three chords. Minimal movement is key.

exercises.name: One Minute Changes A to D
exercises.description: Pushing for a new high score today!

exercises.name: One Minute Changes A to E
exercises.description: Maintain the anchor finger. Don't let the 1st finger leave the 3rd string.

exercises.name: One Minute Changes D to E
exercises.description: The most challenging switch so far. Keep the movements small.

exercises.name: Riff: Peter Gunn Theme
exercises.description: Low E string: 0-0-2-0-3-0-5-4. Use downpicks and stay on the beat.
